answers.answer: Ive had some strange vision problems. Idk what it was.My vision looked like a broken mirror in one area and it was blurry in another area but it didn't last more than an hour.I would tell your doctor.

Your vision changes durimg pregacy. Mine did I used to have to wear glasses and contscts now I don't have to... but if its only in one eye is a sign of preclamsia. I would call and let them kmow asap..

I've had that happen too but mine only usually happens when I'm laying down trying to rest or just waking up. It will last anywhere from 5-30 minutes. I would definitely talk to your Dr if it is that bad.
agree with garlinmommy, check your blood presure.
